channel.title: Eventcia
channel.description:
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/4rg4ygax1/Untitled_2.png[/img][img]http://s7.postimage.org/fiivnz5az/Untitled.png[/img] [hr] [b][size=24pt]Introduction[/size][/b] Eventcia is now here in development part. We are currently searching for some members who will develop it. The server will be economic based server. It will be unique because of some features. We are currently working on fixing bugs and make more stable to hold more players then other Project Insanity's servers. There some custom maps and we will probably update more. [hr] [size=24pt][b]Team[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Xion - Developer (artem543)[/li][/ul]
[hr] [size=24pt][b]Updates[/b][/size] [code] DD/MM/YY Name: Description
06/12/11 Xion: Added Hyperion Event system. 06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Client startup errors(Animation.java:1710) 06/12/11 Xion: Small repacking changes 06/12/11 Xion: Added Pathfinding System(Clipping) 06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Compiler directory's 06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Following clipping. 07/12/11 Xion: Added Killamess's Single door system. 07/12/11 Xion: Added Killamess's Double door system. 08/12/11 Xion: Fixed 60 Eclipse Warnings. 08/12/11 Xion: Fixed 4-5 Dupes. 08/12/11 Xion: Added Thieving system (NPC and Stalls).
[/code] [hr] [size=24pt][b]Goals[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Server to hold 300 player no lag.[/li] [li]No 474+ Contents (Cache too Big)[/li] [li]Allot of unique contents.[/li] [li]Unique Quests.[/li] [li]Fully clipped folowing.[/li][/ul]
[hr] [size=24pt][b]Supporters[/b][/size]
[ul][b]Just say Support or Good Luck if you wish want to be here.[/b] [list] [li]Native^[/li] [li]Loveandpower[/li] [li]mr extremez[/li] [li]AtomicInt_[/li] [li]TheHolyGrail[/li] [li]RandQm[/li] [li]Ix Soulcist xI[/li] [/list] [hr] [size=24pt][b]Joining[/b][/size][/ul] [code] Name: Timezone: Job wanted: Any past experience? Why you chose Eventcia? By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Msn: [/code] [hr]

item.title: Eventcia
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:42, topic:424437”]This thread’s conversational flow is stupid…

@OP, adding Graham’s tasking system won’t make PI efficient enough to hold 300 players. There are a lot of other inefficiencies.[/quote]
Its like 50X better then normal PI event system. And it can hold at least 250. It depends on computer specs too.

Edit: Poll added, Please vote!

Read full topic

@mock_pro wrote:

Name: Trevor
Timezone: -8:00 pacific
Job wanted: anything thats available xD
Any past experience? verry few, but i do have some, i can work with what you give me FOR SURE!
Why you chose Eventcia? The named seemed catchy also, i have really been anxious to help develop something
By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: YES
Msn: capt.t.burrows@gmail.com (same for skype, and yes, u can use gmail with msn -.- )
